name: Maze Cassette
description: Hi! You've stumbled upon my game. AND THAT'S COOL!!! To the point. This game is a horror. The main character has a childhood injury due to the tape. He wants to understand what was on it. There are a lot of riddles in the game. So far there is only one chapter! But Maze Cassette will return with new puzzles. Shhh Shhh...
